Gimel.js

...
Get Started Features
Free & Open-Source

100% free & open-source, licensed under the BSD License

Lightweight

Small and lightweight for fast page loading times (under 7kB minified)

Powerful

Has over 15 functions for DOM HTML/CSS manipulation and effects

Simple to Customize

Contains under 300 lines of code with comments, making it simple to customize

Well-Documented

Well documented with multiple examples for each function and additional demos

No Dependancies

Written in pure javascript with absolutely no dependancies

Get Started in 3 Steps

1. Download Gimel.js

Download the latest version of Gimel.js in a single .zip including both the minified and unminified version.
Download Gimel.js

2. Include Gimel.js

Include the gimel.min.js script in your HTML document before the ending body tag and javascript.
Download Template 
<!doctype html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>Gimel.js Starter Template</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <!-- HTML here -->
    <script src="gimel.min.js"></script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
    // Javascript here
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

3. Download the Docs & Examples

Download the documentation to learn how to use gimel.js with live demos, examples and tips.
Download Docs
